settings.title: Live A Prayer Filled Life
settings.description: We make it easier to fulfill your purpose in prayer. Prayer changes lives.

settings.title: Upgrade Your Prayer Life
settings.description: Let your phone collect the prayer requests of the people you care about… and prompt you to more consistently pray over them. No new technology required

settings.title: Become more intentional with your family and friends
settings.description: Get a consolidated list of prayer requests delivered weekly via text

settings.title: Pray Abundantly and Consistently
settings.description: Reminders 3x a week with weekly updates from your family, friends, or small group

settings.title: Automatically Be Sent New Prayers
settings.description: Your family and friends get a link to update requests so your prayers stay current

settings.title: Use your phone as a spiritual weapon
settings.sub-heading: A LOT of time is spent on the phone.  What if you could use your device for something more eternal?  Our automated text based services makes requesting, receiving, and praying for your friends, family or small groups easier.
settings.title_1: Sign up today and you'll get a text link to add family and friends that will request their prayers
settings.sub-heading_1: You get weekly prayer request reminders sent via text.  You can add or remove recipients anytime.
settings.title_2: Friends and family get a link to input their prayer requests, no fee to them
settings.sub-heading_2: At anytime, they can access the link and update their prayer requests to stay current.

settings.title: Our Features
settings.title_1: Feel the power of prayer with text reminders to pray on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays
settings.sub-heading_1: WIth each text comes a link to access your consolidated list of prayers from your friends and family or small groups
settings.title_2: Show your family and friends you are praying for them
settings.sub-heading_2: If you choose, text "Done" and we'll let them know you just prayed for them
settings.title_3: Update your family and friends anytime
settings.sub-heading_3: You can add or remove recipients and we'll send them a text to add or update their prayers to you

settings.title: Personal Edition
settings.text:
• One Owner/User


• Request prayer requests from up to 10 friend/family members


• User receives link to review requests


• User receive prayer reminders every Mon, Wed, Fri


• Automatically request updates


• OTHER TBD

$12 annually

settings.title: Group Edition
settings.text:
• One Group Owner


• Up to 10 participants


• Entire group able to view all prayer requests


• All participants receive prayer reminders every Mon, Wed, Fri


• Automatically request updates


• OTHER TBD

$100 annually for 10 people

($10 per participant annually)

settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.heading: Contact Us
settings.sub-heading: We can't wait to hear from you
